Commands¶

class dereplicate.Dereplicate_Command.Dereplicate_Command(args_)[source]¶

Dereplicates a set of fasta files. Identical (or identical spanning) sequences are considered replicants. (100% match). NOTE: only dereplicates within each fasta file (not across all files). Merge files before hand if you want to dereplciate across multiple files.

default_program¶

alias of Dereplicate_Program_Vsearch

class clean.Clean_Quality_Command.Clean_Quality_Command(args_)[source]¶

Removes areas of low quality from reads, keeping the longest contiguous segment.

default_program¶

alias of Clean_Quality_Program_Trimmomatic

class clean.Clean_Adapters_Command.Clean_Adapters_Command(args_)[source]¶

Removes adapters (and preceeding barcodes) from sequences in input file(s).

default_program¶

alias of Clean_Adapters_Program_Flexbar

class demux.Demux_Command.Demux_Command(args_)[source]¶

Splits a set of sequences into separate files by sample based on the barcode at the begining of each sequence.

default_program¶

alias of Demux_Program_Fastx

class assemble.Assemble_Command.Assemble_Command(args_)[source]¶

Assembles reads from two (left and right) fastq files/directories. For a set of k forward read files, and k reverse read files, return k assembled files. Matching forward and reverse files should be identically named, except for a <forward>/<reverse> suffix that indicates the read orientation. Two suffix pairs are supported: ‘_forwards’ and ‘_reverse’, and ‘_R1’ and ‘R2’ Choose ONE suffix style and stick to it. e.g. Sample_100_forwards.fq and Sample_100_reverse.fq will be assembled into Sample_100_assembled.fq.

Alternatively, Sample_100_R1.fq and Sample_100_R2.fq will be assembled into Sample_100_assembled.fq. You can provide as many pairs of files as you wish as long as they follow exactly on of the above naming conventions. If a ‘name’ parameter is provided, it will be used as a suffix for all assembled sequence files.
default_program¶

alias of Assemble_Program_Pear

class cluster.Cluster_Command.Cluster_Command(args_)[source]¶

Clusters a set of fasta files. Identical (or identical spanning) sequences are considered replicants. (100% match). NOTE: only Clusters within each fasta file (not across all files). Merge files before hand if you want to dereplciate across multiple files.

class align.Align_Clean_Command.Align_Clean_Command(args_)[source]¶

Cleans a set of alignments by removing gap characters and reference sequences from the file.

default_program¶

alias of Align_Clean_Program_Macse

class align.Align_Command.Align_Command(args_)[source]¶

Aligns a set of fasta files. Identical (or identical spanning) sequences are considered replicants. (100% match). NOTE: only Aligns within each fasta file (not across all files). Merge files before hand if you want to dereplciate across multiple files.

default_program¶

alias of Align_Program_Macse

class preclean.Preclean_Command.Preclean_Command(args_)[source]¶

Fixes sequencing errors.

default_program¶

alias of Preclean_Program_Bayeshammer
